WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is implemented in the experimental Mitigation section.  Not sure why the changelist didn't get attached.  But I'm closing this for right now.  There's more work to do, but I want to get what I've done reviewed.
WorkItem.Description:
Re-work mitigation formulas to be more consistent in how the math is handled.
The goals of this work:
1) Mathematically deal with Def cap properly.
2) Reduce multi-threaded issues
3) Setup mitigation to better match combat attack table - so that values are properly distributed between Crit, Avoidance, Damage Reductions, Healing effects
